channel.title: Configuration on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Enable / disable facebook sharing
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Disable Facebook Sharing An automatic registration is made On FO, on a product, the Facebook logo is absent Enable Facebook sharing An automatic registration is made On FO, on a product, Facebook logo appear Click on it, a new page for Facebook site is open

item.title: Enable / disable twitter sharing
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Disable Twitter Sharing An automatic registration is made On FO, on a product, the Twitter logo is absent Enable Twitter sharing An automatic registration is made On FO, on a product, Twitter logo appear Click on it, a new page for Twitter site is open

item.title: Enable / disable pinterest sharing
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Disable Pinterest Sharing An automatic registration is made On FO, on a product, the Pinterest logo is absent Enable Pinterest sharing An automatic registration is made On FO, on a product, Pinterest logo appear Click on it, a new page for Pinterest site is open
